titleStmt.title: Severall petitions presented to His Excellency the Lord Fairfax. by the Lieut. Generals. Col. Harrisons, Coll. Prides, Coll Deanes. [brace] regiment. : Together with Lievt. Gen. Cromwels letter to His Excellency concerning the same.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Army. Council.
Fairfax, Thomas Fairfax, Baron, 1612-1671.
Cromwell, Oliver, 1599-1658.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in: Henry E. Huntington Library, San Marino, California.
